title: VILLAGE / BOAT
description: This is the boat you can get from the Net picker. This boat takes you to the Sea Fortress island.VILLAGE ORB / ask boat from netpicker

dialogueTree.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "The skiff bobs in the calm waters...."
dialogueTree.text: The skiff bobs in the calm waters. It has nothing more to do.

dialogueTree.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "The skiff floats on the calm mirror..."
dialogueTree.text: The skiff floats on the calm mirror of the sea -- its two seats are empty.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Once you get in, that's it -- one p..."
links.text: Once you get in, that's it -- one pull of the starter handle and you're off into the bay. A strange trepidation comes over you: are you sure you want to go *now*?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Have you made all the necessary pre..."
links.text: Have you made all the necessary preparations? Closed all your accounts?

links.title: Logic: "Remember what the Net Picker said:..."
links.text: Remember what the Net Picker said: It's a small tank. You won't be going back and forth on this.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Nothing to do here without the lieu..."
links.text: Nothing to do here without the lieutenant... You must return here with him.

links.title: You: ""This banged up old thing... it's a..."
links.text: "This banged up old thing... it's a ROO A72."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It'll float.""
links.text: "It'll float."

links.title: Endurance: "He's too banged up himself -- to ta..."
links.text: He's too banged up himself -- to talk torque with you.

links.title: You: ""You take the engine, Kim. I'll hol..."
links.text: "You take the engine, Kim. I'll hold the boombox."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: You: ""What 'what'? How else do we blast..."
links.text: "What 'what'? How else do we blast *Sad FM* on our way to the island?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine." He gives you resigned shrug..."
links.text: "Fine." He gives you resigned shrug. "Let's *blast* Sad FM then."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Sad FM is a radio station specializ..."
links.text: Sad FM is a radio station specializing in sad, slow rock songs. You seem to know its frequency by heart.

links.title: You: ""You heard me. Don't make me repeat..."
links.text: "You heard me. Don't make me repeat myself."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine. Why not?" He shrugs."
links.text: "Fine. Why not?" He shrugs.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Very cool. Now tune it to Sad FM. Y..."
links.text: Very cool. Now tune it to Sad FM. You know you want to.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: You: "First -- tie your porta-reel boombo..."
links.text: First -- tie your porta-reel boombox to the breasthook to keep you company.

links.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "There. This is now a *Rock and roll..."
links.text: There. This is now a *Rock and roll* skiff.

links.title: You: "Cool."
links.text: Cool.

links.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "It'll keep you company on this lone..."
links.text: It'll keep you company on this lonely voyage.

links.title: You: "What did I just do? Why did I do th..."
links.text: What did I just do? Why did I do that?

links.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "Why? Because *Rock and Roll*."
links.text: Why? Because *Rock and Roll*.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yeah. *Sad* rock and roll. Tune it..."
links.text: Yeah. *Sad* rock and roll. Tune it to Sad FM.

links.title: You: "Get in and ride to the island."
links.text: Get in and ride to the island.

links.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "The boat comes to a slow stop. You..."
links.text: The boat comes to a slow stop. You turn the engine off -- then there's silence.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "In the silence -- a sputter of wing..."
links.text: In the silence -- a sputter of wings. A flock of quails takes off in the distance...

links.title: Shivers: "There is very little wind here toda..."
links.text: There is very little wind here today. The ghost is standing still. You look at your arms, then the cliffs above you...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's go." He whispers."
links.text: "Let's go." He whispers.

links.title: You: "[Climb out.]"
links.text: [Climb out.]

links.title: Cuno: ""Good. You made it." Cuno stands wi..."
links.text: "Good. You made it." Cuno stands with his arms akimbo, looking at the shadow of the ruined flak tower looming overhead.

links.title: You: "[Climb out.]"
links.text: [Climb out.]

links.title: Cuno: ""I mapped the place out and uh... i..."
links.text: "I mapped the place out and uh... it looks like both of us aren't gonna make it. This is death island. The hell maw." He wipes snot from his nose.

links.title: You: ""What the hell are you talking abou..."
links.text: "What the hell are you talking about?

links.title: Cuno: ""I don't know." He throws his hands..."
links.text: "I don't know." He throws his hands in the air.

links.title: Cuno: ""Maybe Cuno's just pessimistic beca..."
links.text: "Maybe Cuno's just pessimistic because of the massive speed hangover. I did scout the place out. I can fill you in."

links.title: Cuno: "The kid turns away from you, cautio..."
links.text: The kid turns away from you, cautiously looking to his left and right. He's on the edge.

links.title: Logic: "He hasn't been here before either."
links.text: He hasn't been here before either.

links.title: You: ""This isn't death island. Is it?""
links.text: "This isn't death island. Is it?"

links.title: You: ""Hell island? Finally.""
links.text: "Hell island? Finally."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yes... finally." He says with some..."
links.text: "Yes... finally." He says with some reservations.

links.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "The time has come."
links.text: The time has come.

links.title: You: "[Climb out.]"
links.text: [Climb out.]

links.title: You: "(I'm not ready yet.) [Leave.]"
links.text: (I'm not ready yet.) [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "A skiff with a small steering engin..."
dialogueTree.text: A skiff with a small steering engine in the back floats on the calm mirror of the sea. Its two seats are empty.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "The boat's belly is a shiny yellow..."
links.text: The boat's belly is a shiny yellow colour, industrial paint over fresh tar. You see it reflect off the water, along with the factory number: A72.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "SRV-made, this machine represents h..."
links.text: SRV-made, this machine represents humanitarian aid from a workers' state on the Samaran isola. The *ROO* logo on the engine gives it away -- that and the white five-pointed star.
